en_preview: Reflect the next projectile that hits you back at the attacker.
zh_preview:
将下一次击中你的投射物反弹回攻击者。
\n

en_preview: Put a bounty on a unit. When that unit dies, its killer gains All Stats Up.
zh_preview:
对一个单位下悬赏。
\n该单位死亡时，
\n击杀者获得全属性提升。

en_preview:
Put a bounty on a unit. When that unit dies, it becomes meat and its killer gains All Stats Up.
\n[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]
zh_preview:
对一个单位下悬赏。
\n该单位死亡时，会变成肉，
\n且击杀者获得全属性提升。
\n[s:.7](此法术消耗更低。)[/s]

en_preview: Revive a body to 100% HP and cure one of its injuries. If it was an enemy, it gets charmed.
zh_preview:
复活一个尸体至100%生命值
\n并治愈一处伤口。
\n如果是敌人，则被魅惑。

en_preview: Revive a body to 100% HP and cure one of its injuries. If it was an enemy, it gets charmed.
zh_preview:
复活一个尸体至100%生命值
\n并治愈一处伤口。
\n如果是敌人，则被魅惑。

en_preview: Gain +2 temporary Brace and +2 temporary Thorns until your next turn. Also reflect the next projectile you're hit by.
zh_preview:
直到下回合，
\n获得+2临时坚毅和+2临时荆棘。
\n
\n还可反弹下一次被击中的投射物。

en_preview:
Throw the Spirit Bomb, then this ability becomes Charge Spirit Bomb.
\n[s:.7](Cannot be thrown with 0 charges.)[/s]
zh_preview:
投掷元气弹，
\n然后此技能变为蓄力元气弹。
\n[s:.7](积蓄为0时无法投掷。)[/s]

en_preview: Trample over to a tile with meat on it and Cleave all units in your way.
zh_preview:
践踏到有肉的格子上，
\n并斩击路上的所有单位。

en_preview: Attack yourself with Cleave to gain +2 [img:str].
zh_preview:
使用斩击攻击自己以获得 +2 [img:str]。
\n

en_preview: Attack yourself at half damage with Cleave to gain +2 [img:str].
zh_preview:
使用斩击以半伤害攻击自己以获得 +2 [img:str]。
\n

en_preview: This spell only damages Shield. Cleave and inflict Stun on units with Shield. Deals 3 Knockback to units without Shield.
zh_preview:
此法术只伤害护盾。
\n劈砍并使有护盾的单位眩晕。
\n对无护盾单位造成3点击退。

en_preview: This spell only damages Shield. Cleave and inflict Stun on units with Shield. Deals 10 Knockback to units without Shield.
zh_preview:
此法术只伤害护盾。
\n劈砍并使有护盾的单位眩晕。
\n对无护盾单位造成10点击退。

en_preview: Every enemy in your line of sight takes an extra turn. They are charmed on that turn.
zh_preview:
你视线内的所有敌人获得额外一次行动。
\n
\n他们在该回合被魅惑。

en_preview:
Fire immunity.

Fire immunity.
\nInflict Burn 3 on units that contact you.

火焰免疫。

Electric immunity.

电击免疫。

en_preview:
Your basic attack is a melee attack. You can't equip face armor.
\nAfter each battle, gain +2 [img:str] and -1 [img:int].
\nIf your [img:int] is 0 or less, you have Madness.

你的基础攻击为近战攻击。
\n你不能装备面部护甲。
\n每场战斗后，获得+2 [img:str] 和 -1 [img:int]。
\n

+1 Brace.
\nYou spawn a puddle of creep whenever you get hit. You can't equip face armor.
zh_preview:
+1 坚毅。
\n每当你受到攻击时，
\n会生成一滩爬行物。
\n你不能装备面部护甲。

en_preview: +50% dodge chance. Doomed 3.
zh_preview:
+50% 闪避几率。注定 3。
\n

en_preview: When you take damage from an ability, you have a 15% chance to inflict Burn 5 on yourself and adjacent units.
zh_preview:
当你受到技能伤害时，
\n有15%的几率对你自己及邻近单位施加燃烧5。
\n

en_preview: At the end of each battle gain a random mutation. When you're downed, your corpse is destroyed.

每场战斗结束时获得一个随机突变。
\n
\n当你被击倒时，你的尸体会被摧毁。

en_preview: Your basic attacks inflict Burn 1. Start with Burn 1.
zh_preview:
你的基础攻击附加燃烧1。
\n开始时获得燃烧1。

en_preview:
Its melee flurry inflicts Confusion.
\n50% Dodge Chance.
\nFlying.
zh_preview:
它的近战连击会造成困惑效果。
\n50% 躲避几率。
\n飞行。

en_preview:
Blind. Can melee attack and dash with Trample in random directions.
\nFires shots that inflict Rot whenever it's attacked.
\nHeals itself and its neighbors at the end of its turn.
zh_preview:
盲目。
\n可以使用践踏进行近战攻击和冲刺，
\n方向随机。
\n被攻击时射击造成腐烂效果。

en_preview:
Can perform a flurry melee attack or a headbutt that inflicts Stun.
\nBlind.
zh_preview:
可以进行一连串近战攻击或造成眩晕的头槌。
\n
\n盲目。

en_preview:
Has 2 melee attacks, one with Immobilize, the other with Burn that knocks a unit in the direction it's facing.
\nCan give its allies extra turns.
\nImmune to Fire.
zh_preview:
拥有两种近战攻击，
\n一种带有定身效果，
\n另一种带有燃烧效果并将单位击退到其面向的
\n方向。
\n可以为盟友增加额外回合。

en_preview:
Casts an area spell that inflicts Burn 3 to enemies and gives +1 Damage to allies.
\nInflicts Hex on units that damage it.
\nImmune to Fire.
zh_preview:
施放范围法术，
\n对敌人造成3层燃烧，
\n对盟友赋予+1 伤害。
\n对伤害它的单位施加诅咒。

en_preview:
Melee attacker. If it can melee attack a cat from behind it will inflict Charm.
\nThis Charm lasts until the Charmed cat takes damage.
zh_preview:
近战攻击者。
\n如果它能从背后近战攻击一只猫，
\n将施加魅惑效果。
\n这种魅惑持续直到被魅惑的猫受到伤害。
\n

en_preview:
Melee attacker. If it can melee attack a cat from behind it will inflict Charm.

zh_preview:
近战攻击者。
\n如果它能从背后近战攻击一只猫，

\n这种魅惑持续直到被魅惑的猫受到伤害。

en_preview: Her powerful spells take time to charge up.
zh_preview: 她强大的法术需要时间积蓄。

en_preview:
Retaliates when hit.
\nConsumes adjacent units at the start of his turn.
\nBlind to units behind him.
zh_preview:
被击中时反击。
\n在他的回合开始时吞噬相邻单位。
\n
\n看不见身后的单位。

en_preview: 1 Burn when entering this tile. 2 Burn when starting your turn on this tile.

1 进入此格时燃烧。
\n2 当你在此格开始回合时燃烧。
\n

en_preview: +50% Dodge Chance to things standing in this.
zh_preview:
+50% 躲闪几率，
\n作用于站在此处的目标。

en_preview: +3 Health Regen, +3 Mana Regen, and +50% Dodge Chance to things standing in this.

+3 生命回复，+3 法力回复，
\n
\n及 +50% 躲闪几率，
\n作用于站在此处的目标。

en_preview: 4 Burn when entering or starting your turn on this tile. Moving through this tile costs 2 movement.
zh_preview:
4 进入或在该砖块上开始你的回合时燃烧。
\n
\n穿过该砖块消耗2点移动力。
